Study Title: Irinotecan Plus S1 Versus S1 in Patients With Previously Treated Advanced Esophageal Cancer: ESWN 01 Trial
Brief Summary:
Esophageal cancer is a highly aggressive malignancy with a poor overall outcome.

The purpose of this study is to evaluate the progression free survival and safety of irinotecan plus S1 versus S1 alone in the patients with previously treated advanced esophageal cancer
Secondary Outcome Measures: Adverse Events, 2 year|overall survival, 3 year|response rate, 1.5 year|quality of life, 2 year
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
